name: Marble Madness Remake (cvu232, sarcastic_cat, ramishawasim, Nartgnoh, thebatmanyo)
name_original: Marble Madness Remake (cvu232, sarcastic_cat, ramishawasim, Nartgnoh, thebatmanyo)
description:
"Roll to the goal in a race against time!"

Miss the marble game from the NES days? Introducing its unofficial successor Marble Madness Remake! In this new remake you get to experience 4 new levels with enhanced graphics. Think you can outrun the clock?

Controls:

[WASD/Arrow Keys] - Move around

[Spacebar] - Boost

Gameplay:

Yellow enemies will push you around. Red enemies will destroy you instantly. Avoid holes and reach the purple finish line to beat the level!

As of the most recent update, the infinite points bug has been fixed. Good luck beating our latest high score!

The Team:

Alexandro Di Nunzio - Director/Programmer/Technical Artist

Catherine Turuta - UI Artist/Level Designer

Cindy Vu - Audio Programmer/3D Modeler

Hong Tran - Lead Programmer

Ramisha Wasim - UI Artist/3D Modeler

Asset Credits:

Font: MightySpidey Font by Johanna Vu, Press Start by codeman38

Music: Delorean by Syncro

SFX: Whoosh Effect by Austin Newman, others made in Waveform 11
